backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining Question type and four Map-based answer key stores (flagQuestions, sportsQuestions, intelligenceQuestions, scienceQuestions) mapping question indices to correct answer indices.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five features: expanding question pools for four categories (flags, sports, intelligence, science) to 50+ questions each in Persian, and enhancing randomization in useQuizGame hook to prevent duplicate questions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 14 frontend files describing the quiz game architecture including hooks for game logic with Fisher-Yates shuffle, timer management, UI components for game states, 50+ questions per category in Persian, and OKLCH color theming.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space with warm orange/yellow palette and comprehensive design tokens for UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Persian language meta tags, title 'Hodhod Quiz Competition App', root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering QuizGame page and Toaster notification component.
frontend/src/components/GameOverScreen.t: RTL game over screen displaying loss reason (timeout/wrong answer), question number, correct answer in styled box with primary color, and restart button with destructive color theme.
Question display component with category badge, optional image, and four answer buttons showing dynamic styling (green for correct, red for incorrect, dimmed for unselected) during feedback state.
frontend/src/components/QuizTimer.tsx: Visual countdown timer with clock icon, large numeric display, and progress bar showing color-coded urgency states (destructive ≤3s, warning ≤6s, primary otherwise).
frontend/src/components/StartScreen.tsx: RTL welcome screen with trophy icon, four category cards (flags, sports, intelligence, science), 12-second warning banner, and start button.
frontend/src/components/VictoryScreen.ts: RTL victory celebration screen with animated trophy, sparkles, emoji celebration, and restart button shown after successfully answering all 4 questions.
frontend/src/data/questions.ts: Exports arrays of quiz questions for flags, sports, intelligence, and science categories, each containing question text in Persian, multiple choice options, correct answer index, and image URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor with authentication, automatically recreating the actor when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching quiz questions from four categories (flags, sports, intelligence, science), currently returning local data instead of backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuizGame.ts: Main game logic hook managing quiz state, question shuffling, answer validation, timer handling, sound effects, and progression through four question categories with win/lose conditions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuizTimer.ts: Timer hook that counts down from a specified duration, triggers a callback on expiration, and provides reset functionality for quiz questions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color variables defining a warm orange/yellow theme for both light and dark modes, styled for the Hodhod market brand.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/QuizGame.tsx: Main quiz game page component that orchestrates game flow between start, playing, game over, and victory screens, managing background music and displaying questions with timer.
frontend/src/types/quiz.ts: TypeScript type definitions for quiz data structures including Question, GameState, and GameOverReason interfaces.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings including container, border radius, shadows, fonts, and keyframe animations for UI components.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a Persian-language quiz competition app for Hodhod store with 4 category-based questions, 12-second timers, instant game-over on wrong answers, background music, and visual/audio feedback systems.
